column4: Hey, can someone give me the command for chaning javas priority? I can't do it through system monitor.
ok firstly try running the game with java -jar -Xms 1024 -Xmx 1024 ~/Desktop/minecraft
ok firstly try running the game with java -jar -Xms1024M -Xmx1024M ~/Desktop/minecraft
that's really odd. i mean, minecraft runs like absolute dogcrap on my comp but i'm on an over-sized netbook. you shouldn't have that issue
do me a favor and try replacing your sun-java-6 with openjdk.
try logging into mine (addy in pm)
unless you have a hundred BIG mods installed
what are you doing with it?
seriously switch tabs i want too talk too you in private
